questions.question:
A * B → A is the father of B

A - B → A is the sister of B

A + B → A is the mother of B

A / B → A is the brother of B

If X + Y * Z - W, then how is W related to X?

Pointing to a photograph, a woman said, "He is the son of my mother’s only brother’s daughter."

How is the man in the photograph related to the woman?

A family consists of six members—P, Q, R, S, T, and U.

P is the father of R but not the husband of S.

S is the grandmother of U.

Q is the mother of R.

T is the son of Q.

Who is the husband of S?

A + B means A is the father of B.

A - B means A is the mother of B.

A * B means A is the brother of B.

What does P + Q * R mean?
options: P is the brother of R
P is the father of R
P is the uncle of R
P is the son of R

questions.question: Pointing to a boy, A says, “He is the son of my father’s only daughter.” How is the boy related to A?
